mdis_chrt: Matrix algebra in base R for covariate balance using Mahalanobis distance of a point to its distribution

Source: R/mdis_rman.R
mdis_chrt.Rd

This function will compute M-distance for a covariate matrix to its mean

mdis_chrt(x_i)

Arguments

x_i

A vector or covariate matrix

Value

a numeric vector of length equal to x_i

Examples

require(jumble)
df_x <- ACTG175[, c('age', 'gender', 'race', 'msm')]

mdis_chrt(df_x)
